Name: Guardian
About the game: About the Game Guardian is a 2D side scrolling platformer that follows the story of an unlikely hero transported into Ancient Greece. Guide Arcas on their quest through a dozen detailed levels, each packed with a variety of different threats. Key Features - Swiftly traverse the map with the double jump and dash abilities. - Slay unique sets of enemies found in each level. - Loot coins as you explore and use them to upgrade Arcas's combat power. - Experience a fun take on various Greek Pantheon Gods and Arcas's place among them. Above all else, we hope you enjoy the Erstwhile LARP event!
